```{r }
Multiple<- read.csv("c:/users/kun hu/desktop/Multiple.csv")
```

```{r}
pairs(Multiple)
```

```{r}
linear<- lm(Multiple$Price~Multiple$Size+Multiple$Tax+Multiple$Bedroom)
```

```{r}
summary(linear)
```

We can see only Size has significant impact on sales price based on p-value=0.0251<0.05
